tool_description: Enriches basic contact information with additional data points like social profiles, job titles, and contact preferences to improve lead scoring accuracy.

email.description: Primary email address for the contact

enrichment_sources.description: Data sources to use: social, professional, public_records, company_db

error_messages: Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address in standard format.
Enrichment failed: Unable to find additional data for the provided contact information.
Invalid enrichment source: Use sources from [social, professional, public_records, company_db].
Rate limit exceeded: Too many enrichment requests in short time period.
usage: Provide email address as minimum requirement. Include company_name, first_name, last_name for better matching. Specify enrichment_sources to control data sources used.

enriched_profile.description: Complete contact profile with enriched data as JSON string

confidence_score.description: Confidence level of enriched data accuracy (0-100)

data_sources_used.description: List of data sources that provided enrichment data
